response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I understand its true worth to be $15,000. However, I am offering it to you today at an exclusive price of $12,000. This is an opportunity not to be missed, considering the substantial benefits this product can bring to your endeavors. I look forward to discussing how we can make this valuable asset yours.", "product_price": 12000}
